LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Militarum_Chief_Medic.title: chief medical officer
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Militarum_Chief_Medic.baseDe: [PAWN_nameDef] had previous experience as a doctor on their homeworld. When the Imperial Guard tithed [PAWN_possessive] homeworld, [PAWN_pronoun] was made the regimental Chief Medic.
